scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../fullstackopen2022/part3/followingCourse/courseexample_b_part2_courseexample_e_Frontend && npm run build && cp -r build ../../../../fullstackopen2022_part3_followingCourse_BE
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy
